name: Roots of Terror
description:
Roots of Terror is a 2D horror game where the player explores a haunted forest searching for a missing person. The player must navigate through the dark and creepy forest plagued by strange and frightening creatures that have emerged from the roots of the trees. Using only their trusty flashlight, the player must light their way and use their wits to avoid the dangers lurking in the shadows. The player must collect upgrades and use quick reflexes to outwit these grotesque creatures, and unravel the mystery behind the forest.

Use 'WASD' or the arrow keys for movement and 'SpaceBar' for jumping. Besides that, you can press 'e' to interact with the objects in the game. Lastly, use your mouse to control the direction of your torchlight.

Roots of Terror was developed by Copebros for Global Game Jam under 48 hours. The team consists of:

  • Heng "Aru" Fuyen
    • Lead Designer
  • Aidan Wong
    • Sound Designer
  • James Jawan
    • Designer

    • Lead Artist
